title: Lowest Cereal Yield
description: Cape Verde has the lowest cereal yield in the world, with only 11.5 kg per hectare as of 2022.

title: Fewest Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: In 2021, Cape Verde had only 1 patent application by nonresidents, one of the lowest in the world.

title: High Transparency and Accountability
description: Cape Verde scored 4.5 out of 6 in the CPIA transparency, accountability, and corruption in the public sector rating in 2023, indicating a relatively high level of transparency.

title: High Coal Rents as Percentage of GDP
description: In 2021, coal rents accounted for 17.18% of Cape Verde's GDP, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Low Ores and Metals Exports
description: Cape Verde's ores and metals exports made up only 0.000058% of its merchandise exports in 2023, one of the lowest in the world.
